ZIP_CODE_DESCRIPTION: Zip Code (It is needed just in case that we need to connect you with an Assistant near you)
CREDIT_SCORE_DESCRIPTION: Credit Score (It will help us understand I you are ready)
MONTHLY_INCOME_DESCRIPTION: Monthly Income (How much do you approximately get paid monthly)
MONTHLY_DEBTS_DESCRIPTION: Monthly Debts (Add up all your credit cards minimum payments + Car payment + the mortgage payment if you own ahother property)

FORM_ERROR.NUMBER: This field must be only numbers

WELCOME_.WELCOME: Hey, thanks for stopping by! We are thrilled to hear that you are interested in buying a home.
WELCOME_.ABOUT_WE: We’re a team of professionals helping our clients find their easy way to buy a house and guide them throughout the process.
WELCOME_.OUR_WORK: Our work involves answering all your queries, presenting you valuable tips, and assisting you to connect with the best professionals in your area.
WELCOME_.CALL: Want to have an introduction call?

MAIN_SCREEN.TITLE: Buying a house can be an intimidating process, but there is no need to panic we are here to help.
MAIN_SCREEN.BUYING_PROCESS: The process of buying a house.
MAIN_SCREEN.CARD_BODY_ONE: Firstly, you need a pre-approval letter to work with a real estate agent. Click here to get your pre-approval letter.
MAIN_SCREEN.CARD_BODY_TWO: Choose your real estate agent wisely, and it will make a lot of processes easy for you. To contact top agents of your area.
MAIN_SCREEN.CARD_BODY_THREE: You should provide your real estate agent with a list of the priorities you’re looking for in your future house. Click here to see which ones are they.
MAIN_SCREEN.CARD_TITLE_FOUR: Get your Home Inspected and Appraised
MAIN_SCREEN.CARD_BODY_FOUR: Once your offer is approved, you need to start looking for a home inspector in your area. Click to find out what you need to know.
MAIN_SCREEN.CARD_BODY_FIVE: Before making the deal, have a last thorough self-walk in the house to verify that everything is ok.

PRE_APPROVED.FIRST_TEXT: Now it has become easier to get your pre-approved letter and to know whether you qualify for a house mortgage or not.
PRE_APPROVED.FILL_SURVEY_FORM: Please fill in the information below as accurately as possible.

PRE_APPROVED_RESULT.TITLE: Get Pre-approved
PRE_APPROVED_RESULT.SUB_TITLE: Steps in the process of buying a home.
PRE_APPROVED_RESULT.MESSAGE: It is our great pleasure to inform you that you’ve successfully qualified for a house mortgage and now we would just need to verify the information provided by you.
PRE_APPROVED_RESULT.STEP_1: Schedule a meeting to provide us with all the necessary paperwork.
PRE_APPROVED_RESULT.MESSAGE_LETTER: Once you get your pre-approval letter, you’ll be licensed to continue with the further steps.
PRE_APPROVED_RESULT.MESSAGE_NOT: We regret to inform you that we are unable to approve your request at this time. But not all is lost, we may be able to assist you further.
PRE_APPROVED_RESULT.MESSAGE_CONTACT: One of our assistants will contact you with more details.

HIRE_REAL_ESTATE_AGENT.TITLE: Hire a Real Estate Agent
HIRE_REAL_ESTATE_AGENT.STEP_PROCESS: Steps in the process of buying a house.
HIRE_REAL_ESTATE_AGENT.TEXT_1: Your real estate agent is your representative throughout the entire transaction. Acting in your best interest, your agent will look for homes that meet your criteria, arrange showings, help you write offers and negotiate prices.
HIRE_REAL_ESTATE_AGENT.TEXT_2: As a buyer, you should get the help of a real estate agent for free. In most cases, the seller will pay the agent’s commission, which is usually 3% of the purchase price.
HIRE_REAL_ESTATE_AGENT.MAKE_SURE: Make sure to hire the right one!
HIRE_REAL_ESTATE_AGENT.MEET: Here are some helpful questions to ask when you meet a Real Estate Agent:
HIRE_REAL_ESTATE_AGENT.STEP_1: How long have you been a real estate agent?
HIRE_REAL_ESTATE_AGENT.STEP_2: Do you work full-time or part-time as a real estate agent?
HIRE_REAL_ESTATE_AGENT.STEP_3: How many homes do you help clients buy each year?
HIRE_REAL_ESTATE_AGENT.STEP_4: Do you have any references I can call?
HIRE_REAL_ESTATE_AGENT.FINE_BEST_AGENT: Find me the best Agent in my Area

SHOP_FOR_YOUR_HOME.TITLE: Shop for Your Home
SHOP_FOR_YOUR_HOME.STEP_PROCESS: Steps in the process of buying a house.
SHOP_FOR_YOUR_HOME.TEXT_1: Before your real estate agent begins to look for homes that are within your budget, you should provide the agent with a list of your priorities. Here are some things you might want to consider:
SHOP_FOR_YOUR_HOME.STEP_3: Home condition and possible need for repairs
SHOP_FOR_YOUR_HOME.TEXT_2: When you have found a house that you want to buy, simply ask your real estate agent to write an offer. That’s it!

GET_YOUR_HOME.TITLE: Get a Home Inspection and an Appraisal
GET_YOUR_HOME.STEP_PROCESS: Steps in the process of buying a house.
GET_YOUR_HOME.TEXT_1: Once your offer is approved you need to start looking for a home inspector in your area, schedule meetings with at least 3 professionals, and be sure to ask them the following questions:
GET_YOUR_HOME.STEP_1: What do you charge for a home inspection?
GET_YOUR_HOME.STEP_2: How long have you had this job?
GET_YOUR_HOME.STEP_3: How long will it take to get the results of the inspection?

CLOSE_YOUR_HOME.TITLE: Close On Your New Home
CLOSE_YOUR_HOME.TEXT_1: Before the closing day you should take the time to do one last walkthrough alone in your new home. Check everything one more time and make sure that the seller has made the repairs you requested and cleared out the property. If everything looks good, you can confidently move ahead. And after closing finishes, you’re officially a homeowner!
